Posts.Content: Goodness - I've been eating cheese, porridge made with milk, custard  etc.  I haven't read, or been told about dairy foods.  Where can I read this advice megan?

Posts.Content: I've had 5 doses of Docetaxel and Carboplatin.  My legs ache even when I walk across the room, let alone go for a walk.  Anyone else have the same?   Will this go away now the chemo has finished?  Will it persist with the radiotherapy?  How does the radiotherapy affect us.
Posts.Title: legs aching
